aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMe.content: My name is Alex Zorzin and I'm a Full-Stack web developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I'm interested in starting my career as a developer and I'm looking for opportunities in order to improve and learn actively in an innovative team. My goal is to work on exciting and challenging projects so I can apply my skills and knowledge in a practical way and keep learning constantly. I am passionate about the programming field and am willing to go the extra mile to be a valuable asset to any development team.
